text: Abangavumelekanga kuni (ukuba nibatshate): ngoomama benu, iintombi zenu, odade wenu; oodadobawo benu, oomakazi benu, iintombi zabantakwenu, iintombi zoodade benu, umama (ongengowakho) okondlileyo ngokukuncancisa (ebeleni lakhe), iintombi ezingengodade benu enincanciswe belenilinye nazo, oomama babafazi benu, iintombi zabafazi benu eziphantsi kogcino lwenu, zizalwa ngabafazi benu esele ningenile kubo kodwa ke akusosono kuni (ukuzitshata) ukuba beningekangeni koomama bazo, abafazi boonyana benu abaphuma kwezenu izinqe neentombi ezimbini ezingoodade azinakwendela ndodeninye kuni ngaxeshanye8, ngaphandle koko sekwenzeke kwilixa elidlulileyo.
